original_text: But when the man shares his things with his children, he must promise this: After his death, the firstborn son will receive what he should have. The man may not choose to give the double share of his things to the son of the wife that he loves.
korean_text: 자기의 소유를 그의 아들들에게 기업으로 나누는 날에 그 사랑을 받는 자의 아들을 장자로 삼아 참 장자 곧 미움을 받는 자의 아들보다 앞세우지 말고

sentences.original_text: But when the man shares his things with his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 사람이 자녀들과 자기 것을 나눌 때

sentences.original_text: the firstborn son will receive what he should have
sentences.korean_translation: 맏아들은 그가 받아야 할 것을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The man may not choose to give
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 주기로 선택할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: the double share of his things
to the son of the wife that he loves
